attributes.action: Create and emergency windfall tax on highly paid bankers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition the Prime Minister to create an emergency windfall tax on all individuals earning over £150,000 per annum and working in the banking sector.

Such tax to be levied at 90% of income, and to be payable on all monies received irrespective of when received (do not allow them to vote bonuses with a later payment date, or pay their bonuses is shares or other methods)

We believe that the government is rightly going to legislate to stop the obscene bonuses that have been paid historically to bankers, and we understand that many banks are planning to pay bonuses prior to the introduction of such a tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
